about_the_game:
ARCH WIZARD is a fast paced First Person "Hyper Shooter":

  • Tight battlefields
  • A few very distinct enemies
  • Many tricks in your sleeve
  • A lot mechanics to master

Blend all your moves, skills and abilities into one personalized flow of magic rage. A calculated ever adapting dance between enemies. Using their attacks and even detached body parts to dig into the depths of combat spell craft.


You are a powerful mage. Lost in the ruins of warp portal network, once connecting the outskirts of the multiverse.
You must fight your way through cosmoses.
First — to get back to your Tower.
Second — to establish dominance on the parallel realms.
To go back from THE OTHER SIDE.
To find the source of Chaos.
To face the End of the World
To become the eternal ARCH WIZARD — an architect, a director, a tailor of your own fait.


Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.
